name: Tangerine Hair
description:
## Tangerine Hair

Stand out from the crowd with Harry's vibrant tangerine hair, spiked to perfection and crowned with a mustache of authority.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
